review_text:
The real name of this restaurant is : "Uama Teppanyaki Restaurant" and it's on the first floor of the hotel NOT on the 2nd floor as mentionned on the description. You have the choice between 2 buffets. First one costs 238 RMB and the second one costs 298 RMB. It has crabs, spider crab, .... that the first buffet doesn't...
Ещё
